com.github.protobufel.common.files

Class Globs

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.protobufel.common.files.Globs

  • public class Globs
extends Object
    An utility for a glob to regex conversion. This is a near mirror of the OpenJDK 7 sun.nio.fs.Globs with some methods made public, and the returned Pattern without first ^ and last $.
    Author:
    protobufel@gmail.com David Tesler

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Creates a regex pattern from the given glob expression.

      static String toWindowsRegexPattern(String globPattern)
